title: Practical Reinforced Concrete Column and Pier Design Using Artificial Neural Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Structural Mechanics, Basic Reinforced Concrete Design Theory, and Spreadsheet Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on mastering ANN-based design techniques for immediate field application by professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can derive design parameters for rectangular/circular reinforced concrete sections with 95% accuracy using an ANN model.
Learners can explain the input/output relationships of ANN design functions for T-beams and cross-reinforced beams based on practical case standards.
Learners can perform design simulations over 100 times faster than conventional procedures using ANN code implemented in spreadsheets.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
